casebody.data:
PROPST BROS. DISTS., INC., Plaintiff
v.
SHREE KAMNATH CORP., Defendant
and
McDonalds Corp., Third-Party Intervenor No. 69P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019

R. Kenneth Helms, Jr., Stephen M. Bennett, Attorneys at Law, Monroe, For Shree Kamnath Corp.

Kip David Nelson, Greensboro, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Raleigh, Attorneys at Law, For Propst Bros. Dists., Inc.

Mark P. Henriques, Charlotte, Michael A. ingersoll, Attorneys at Law, For McDonalds Corp.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of February 2019 by 3rd Party in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

*156"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
